template.name: evolution_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the evolution module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for evolution email client and other related evolution applications such as webcal and alarm type is also created to protect the user evolution keys.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: evolution_home_filetrans
template.summary: Create objects in users evolution home folders.

desc.p: This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created. If no class is specified, dir will be used.

template.name: evolution_stream_connect
template.summary: Connect to user evolution unix stream socket.

desc.p: Connect to user evolution unix stream socket.
This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: evolution_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from evolution over dbus.

interface.name: evolution_alarm_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from evolution_alarm over dbus.
